title: Gas shipment arrives and distribution to begin
body_lines: With the arrival of 2, 500 MT of domestic gas shipment, the gas companies have initiated their production, Trade Minister Lasantha Alagiyawanna said.
He said the gas shipment is currently being unloaded at the company’s storage terminal in Kerawalapitiya.
With the distribution of required gas stocks, the shortage will be resolved immediately. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
